overview: A woman locks herself in the bathroom. It’s late at night and everything -and everybody- will remain outside her small, claustrophobic world. But before the new day arrives he will knock at the door. This is a combination of dance and the cinematic exploration of the tension between loneliness and contact, a tension we could call intimacy.
tagline: It’s late at night and everything -and everybody- will remain outside her small, claustrophobic world.
title: Interior Bathroom Night
